definition: people from ancient times/the ancients/the late (i.e. person who has passed away)
ancient hominid species such as Homo erectus, Neanderthal man etc
to fret over the worries of long-departed people (idiom); to worry unnecessarily/crying over spilt milk/often used with negatives, e.g. no need to worry about past issues

pinyin: qian2 bu4 jian4 gu3 ren2 , hou4 bu4 jian4 lai2 zhe3
containing_words.word: 前不見古人，後不見來者

definition: to surpass all others of its kind before and since/to have neither predecessors nor successors
pinyin: qian2 wu2 gu3 ren2 hou4 wu2 lai2 zhe3

definition: to fret over the worries of long-departed people (idiom); to worry unnecessarily/crying over spilt milk/often used with negatives, e.g. no need to worry about past issues

pinyin: Meng3 gu3 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

sentences.english: Most ancient Chinese people thought that nothing is lofty except reading books.
sentences.chinese: 大多數古人認爲萬般皆下品唯有讀書高。

sentences.english: Most tof the inhabitants are Mongolian.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的大多數人是蒙古人。

sentences.english: The ancients cloud, qianlizhidi, ulcer in the colony.
sentences.chinese: 古人云，千里之堤，潰於蟻穴。

sentences.english: The first evidence that ancient people had moved to Mesa Verde is from about the year five hundred.
sentences.chinese: 古人移居到梅沙而第的第一個證據來自公元五百年。

sentences.english: Of the 19 mummies examined, only three are Mongolian.
sentences.chinese: 檢驗的19個乾屍中，只有三個是蒙古人。

sentences.english: The ancients cloud "doom to death and then".
sentences.chinese: 古人云“置之死地而後生”。

sentences.english: The sage said, The heart of loving beauty exists everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 古人也雲，愛美之心，人皆有之。

sentences.english: The ancients provocative, were watching the moon if water is so.
sentences.chinese: 古人今人若流水，共看明月皆如此。

sentences.english: The announcement electrified the paleoanthropology community.
sentences.chinese: 這個消息震驚了古人類學界。

sentences.english: Ancient people's understanding of statistic was limited in many given categories.
sentences.chinese: 古人關於文體的認識散見於諸多特定的範疇之中。

sentences.english: Many Mongolians suspected a Chinese-style political squeeze.
sentences.chinese: 許多蒙古人懷疑這是中國式的政治施壓。

sentences.english: How did the ancients correct misprint?
The ancients clean up the mouth and teeth with your fingers and Panicum.
sentences.chinese: 古人清理口腔和牙齒用手指和柳枝。

sentences.english: The ancients again cloud"engaging fair lady, gentleman good Qiu".
sentences.chinese: 古人又云“窈窕淑女，君子好逑”。

sentences.english: The theme of hamadryad originates from the valuable experience of the ancients of protecting natural surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 樹神母題是中國古人生態環境保護觀念的經驗結晶。

definition: since ancient times/it has ever been the case that/see also 自古以來|自古以来[zi4 gu3 yi3 lai2]
pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
worthy predecessor/distinguished person of the past/former sage
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
